publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: How could legal restrictions and punishments in themselves ever
How could legal restrictions and punishments in themselves ever

sense.def: various kinds of penalties and punishments

tls:text.tls:line: did not set up laws and measures
did not set up laws and measures
[Their] laws and rules were not the same.
[Their] laws and rules were not the same.
[Their] laws and rules were not the same.
Laws and orders were clear and there was no confusion.
with their deviousness they contravene
his laws and edicts being circumspect will not be unduly harsh,
but we guard their laws and registers, ordinances and orders.

sense.def: the laws and measures/regulations of the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: he will voluntarily abide by laws and regulations

seg.line: 則先王之法度有移易者矣。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則先王之法度有移易者矣。

sense.def: written decision by the relevant authorities

tls:text.tls:line: the laws and regulations
the laws and regulations
the laws and regulations

seg.line: 非得聖王為之法度而教導之，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 非得聖王為之法度而教導之，

sense.def: the laws and measures/regulations of the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: It wasn't that there were no laws and regulations/administrative procedures
The laws are published with an eye

sense.def: the physical object constituted by a legal text

tls:text.tls:line: The laws are published with an eye

sense.def: cause to hang> suspend, hang; tie up and hang up

tls:text.tls:line: to punishing those who violate them;
to punishing those who violate them;
and in the lands beyond the seas men became crafty.
The lands beyond the seas acknowledged his suzerainty

sense.def: be consistent with, not be incompatible with
dredge out and explain; give full expression to.
be weak and easily broken 說文：易斷

seg.line: 相與優游競暢于宇宙之間，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 相與優游競暢于宇宙之間，
tls:text.tls:line: mutually roaming freely and racing to fill the interstices of time and space,

sense.def: the universe of space and time (according to HNZ "the (cosmic) eaves and rafters" 高誘 注："宇，屋簷也；宙，棟梁也。")

tls:text.tls:line: Reach for it, and you cannot grasp it.

sense.def: grasp after, hold on to, touch, reach out after

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven and Earth had not yet split apart;
yin and yang had not yet been carved out;
[You can] hide a boat in a ravine,

sense.def: hide/store N1 in the place N2
hide/store N1 in the place N2

tls:text.tls:line: in the middle of the night, a strong man can put [the boat] on his back and run off with it,

sense.def: race away from the place N

tls:text.tls:line: and the sleeper does not know about it.
he did not know that he had ever been a human being.

sense.def: at one point, some time ago; once in the past, on one occasion; in the past;

tls:text.tls:line: When ice welcomes spring, it melts and becomes water.
The myriad things were peaceful and dispassionate and so became contented and tranquil.

sense.def: human subject: be quiet; be in a state of quiet tranquility; have inner peace

tls:text.tls:line: The myriad things were peaceful and dispassionate and so became contented and tranquil.
The myriad things were peaceful and dispassionate and so became contented and tranquil.
The myriad things were peaceful and dispassionate and so became contented and tranquil.

sense.def: be serene, have peace of mind, be calm 甚靜

tls:text.tls:line: drummed on their bellies in contentment.
drummed on their bellies in contentment.

sense.def: fool around, play around; mess about with

tls:text.tls:line: only then do we understand the vigor of pine and cypress;
only then do we understand the vigor of pine and cypress;
Thus, they take the Way as their pole;

sense.def: bamboo pole; pole; staff[aslo rod for fishing][CA]

tls:text.tls:line: Humaneness and Rightness as their bait;
They view benefit and harm as dust and dirt,

sense.def: dust and dirt (often: of this world); mere dust 塵垢之外

tls:text.tls:line: view life and death as day and night.
these are unable to disturb their harmony.
is like an encounter with mosquitoes and gnats
is like an encounter with mosquitoes and gnats
A fast wind can snap trees,
A fast wind can snap trees,
a person who falls will break his spine and shatter his skull,

sense.def: fall; fall off (a horse); fall out (of teeth)

tls:text.tls:line: a person who falls will break his spine and shatter his skull,
a person who falls will break his spine and shatter his skull,
a person who falls will break his spine and shatter his skull,
a person who falls will break his spine and shatter his skull,
Now to accumulate wisdom and multiply generosity,

sense.def: collect and amass, typically on a large scale

tls:text.tls:line: Now to accumulate wisdom and multiply generosity,

sense.def: an ability to engage in profound and thorough reflection; discursive cleverness; BUDDH: the highest form of religious consciousness and insight, and one of the perfections of the Boddhisattva. Sanskrit prajñā.

tls:text.tls:line: Now to accumulate wisdom and multiply generosity,
Now to accumulate wisdom and multiply generosity,
To block off the nine orifices,

sense.def: block up, cause to be closed to the outside; block out (outsiders)

tls:text.tls:line: To block off the nine orifices,

sense.def: opening to the outside world, aperture; hollow; hole
store up; take good care of; store up and collect; store up to keep safe

tls:text.tls:line: [with] dragons, snakes, tigers, and lepards,

sense.def: dragon[BUDDH: in the Buddhist context dragons (SANSKRIT nāga) are regarded as one of the eight kind of beings who protect the Buddhist teachings]

tls:text.tls:line: [with] dragons, snakes, tigers, and lepards,
[with] dragons, snakes, tigers, and lepards,
[with] dragons, snakes, tigers, and lepards,
you will not be able to avoid becoming enslaved to material things.

sense.def: serve as a dependent or slave

tls:text.tls:line: you will not be able to avoid becoming enslaved to material things.
you will not be able to avoid becoming enslaved to material things.
Your mistakes are already made:
For this reason, sages inwardly cultivate the techniques of the way
For this reason, sages inwardly cultivate the techniques of the way

sense.def: the person of extraordinary and creative talent (with untensed predicate)

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason, sages inwardly cultivate the techniques of the way
For this reason, sages inwardly cultivate the techniques of the way

sense.def: cultivate (one's person, the ancients etc); apply oneself to; train and exercise (troops); occasionally also with negative objects: LH 2 修詐 "cultivate fraudulence"

tls:text.tls:line: and do not adorn themselves externally with Humaneness and Rightness.

sense.def: externally; on the outside; as a visible expression; towards the outside

tls:text.tls:line: and do not adorn themselves externally with Humaneness and Rightness.

sense.def: put on an attractive show of

tls:text.tls:line: below survey the three springs,
below survey the three springs,

sense.def: look for (a thing); seek to obtain

tls:text.tls:line: broadly span the six coordinates,
bind and unite the myriad things,

sense.def: the myriad kinds of things/creatures; all manner of things

tls:text.tls:line: flow into utmost emptiness

sense.def: ultimately; extremely; to the highest degree; be the most (marker of superlative)

tls:text.tls:line: they ride the gryphon and follow the sphinx;
take Mi Fei as a concubine,
They subjugate the Duke of Thunder,

sense.def: gain as a minister; make into a minister; take as a servant

tls:text.tls:line: it will certainly obscure their vision.
How much more is this true of what cannot envelope these very things?

seg.line: 此其為山淵之勢亦遠矣。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 此其為山淵之勢亦遠矣。
tls:text.tls:line: This is even further from the grandeur of mountains and abysses.

sense.def: "the general point is": particle marking a generalising judgment

tls:text.tls:line: and the myriad things were greatly abundant.

sense.def: be in abundant supply; have a surplus, not be exhausted (often used figuratively)

tls:text.tls:line: When the age declined,
Coming to the age of the Divine Farmer
and the Yellow Emperor

sense.def: Unger no. 235, also UNGER SACH Huang ti

tls:text.tls:line: kneaded the hard and the soft,

sense.def: that which is firm, the firm and strong things; a hard substance

tls:text.tls:line: kneaded the hard and the soft,
kneaded the hard and the soft,
Coming down to the house of Zhou,

sense.def: yì jí: when it came to the time of

tls:text.tls:line: the collected wealth [of the world] was insufficient to meet their expenses.

seg.line: 以求鑿枘於世而錯擇名利，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 以求鑿枘於世而錯擇名利，
tls:text.tls:line: seeking to force conditions on the age and crookedly acquire fame and profit.

tls:text.tls:srcline: 以求鑿枘於世而錯擇名利，
tls:text.tls:line: seeking to force conditions on the age and crookedly acquire fame and profit.

sense.def: BUDDH: fame and benefit > nominal success in this world, superficial benefit

tls:text.tls:line: and lost the root of the Great Ancestor.

sense.def: come to lose what one used to own (e.g. a city, an arm); lose control of; fail to get right what one ought to get right (timing); MENG: fail to stick to (the Way), stray from, disregard; lose count of (the date); stray from (the right road); lose contact with (a person)

seg.line: 是故舉世而譽之不加勸，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是故舉世而譽之不加勸，

sense.def: the whole world; everyone in the whole world

tls:text.tls:line: The nature of humans is tranquil, yet desires disorder it.

sense.def: (also written without the 口字旁）all kinds of （excessive） desires

tls:text.tls:line: for mouth and nose [to perceive] fragrances and tastes,
for mouth and nose [to perceive] fragrances and tastes,
for mouth and nose [to perceive] fragrances and tastes,
for mouth and nose [to perceive] fragrances and tastes,
for mouth and nose [to perceive] fragrances and tastes,
for ears and eyes [to perceive] colors and sounds,
for ears and eyes [to perceive] colors and sounds,
for ears and eyes [to perceive] colors and sounds,

sense.def: noise of any kind, sound of any kind

tls:text.tls:line: for ears and eyes [to perceive] colors and sounds,
for flesh and skin [to perceive] cold and heat.
for flesh and skin [to perceive] cold and heat.
If the spirrit is clear, lusts and desires cannot disorder it.

sense.def: (also written without the 口字旁）all kinds of （excessive） desires

tls:text.tls:line: this is to discard your brilliance

sense.def: put down, put aside, put away; reject and rid oneself of; dismiss and reject; sometimes figurative: give up (on a task)

seg.line: 入於四海九江而不能濡，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 入於四海九江而不能濡，
tls:text.tls:line: enter the Four Seas or the Nine Rivers and cannot be trapped;
your words add luster to jade and stone;
you will not even be able to safeguard your person.
If a wasp or a scorpion stings your finger, your spirit cannot remain placid.
If a wasp or a scorpion stings your finger, your spirit cannot remain placid.
If a wasp or a scorpion stings your finger, your spirit cannot remain placid.
If a wasp or a scorpion stings your finger, your spirit cannot remain placid.
to disturb your mind

sense.def: interfere with, disturb the peace of

tls:text.tls:line: How can it be done?

sense.def: cope with, deal with; be able to do something about

tls:text.tls:line: Merchants prospered in their markets;
Merchants prospered in their markets;
Merchants prospered in their markets;
farmers rejoiced in their work;
farmers rejoiced in their work;

sense.def: feel deeply communictively happy with or in

tls:text.tls:line: grasses and trees did not die prematurely;
opened the heart of a worthy man,

sense.def: split; cut open (a heart etc); have cut open (one's back)

tls:text.tls:line: cut off the feet of a talented knight,
minced the daughter of the marquis of Gui,

sense.def: be because of the npro, be the 'fault' of the npro
be because of the npro, be the 'fault' of the npro
